subject: New Classes when refactoring
msgSnippet: I picked Refactoring - Martin Fowler up at Java One.  The question I have is:  When you add new class during refactoring, perhaps adding a value object or
messageBody:
I picked Refactoring - Martin Fowler up at Java One. The question I have
is: When you add new class during refactoring, perhaps adding a "value
object" or "replacing conditional logic with polymorphism" do you test it
through your original JUnit Tests or do you build a new Test class for the
new class.

Randolph M. Cox, CDP, CCP
Application Development Specialist
COUNTRY Insurance and Financial Services
1711 G.E. Road
Bloomington, Ill. 61702-2020
